step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with your arms overhead and fingers open. Keep this position for the next step.
You're doing well stretching your arms back overhead. Remember to exhale and relax as you do this.
Your fists are forming and you're pushing down. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together a bit more as you inhale and tighten.
You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Focus on a smooth, relaxed movement.
You're completing the movement. Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead and your fingers are open as you begin each repetition.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching your arms overhead and to squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. This helps build strength and promote lymph drainage.
